title: Mount Si
description: Gonna have to camp in an RV or trailer, but the hiking is top notch. 4/5

title: Mount St Helens
description: Great Hike, pretty alright camping spots. 3/5

title: Tinkham Campground
description: Very Green, spots for RV's and trailers. Not many spots to hike. 3/5

title: Gold Basin Campground
description: Great View of River. Doesn't let you fish, which is Heresy. 2/5
